description.en:
During this introductory entrepreneurship course, the student gets acquainted with the ideas of entrepreneurial life style. Concepts, like an entrepreneur, entrepreneurship, failure, entrepreneurial team, and other will be introduced and experienced.
Creation of the business ideas, entrepreneurial processes, evaluation and feedback of developed ideas will be the central focus of this course. Also, teams will perform a small customer survey and conduct interviews with entrepreneurs.
FInally, each team will get a chance to present their ideas to real entrepreneurs and practitioners.
description.et:
During this introductory entrepreneurship course, the student gets acquainted with the ideas of entrepreneurial life style. Concepts, like an entrepreneur, entrepreneurship, failure, entrepreneurial team, and other will be introduced and experienced.
Creation of the business ideas, entrepreneurial processes, evaluation and feedback of developed ideas will be the central focus of this course. Also, teams will perform a small customer survey and conduct interviews with entrepreneurs.
FInally, each team will get a chance to present their ideas to real entrepreneurs and practitioners.

objectives.en: This course aims to provide an opportunity to experience the entrepreneurial processes and to develop the expertise for making professional career choices. The course will allow the learner to experience creative thinking, aspects of entrepreneurship competence, develop the sense of initiative, and ability to recognise opportunities and act on these opportunities.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on võimaldada õppijal läbida ettevõtlusprotsess, et ta saaks teha põhjendatud valikuid töötamaks ettevõtja või ettevõtliku palgatöötajana. Kujundada loovat mõtlemist, õpetada ettevõtliku käitumise põhimõtteid ning anda võimalus omandada teadmisi ärivõimaluste äratundmise, äriideede arendamise, hindamise ning rakendamise kohta erinevates ettevõtluskeskkondades.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. Analyzes her/his competencies against entrepreneurship competence to identify the strengths and areas of potential development.
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Analüüsib ennast ja oma rolli ettevõtlus-protsessis.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Applies the idea generation, development and evaluation methods.
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Rakendab äriidee loomise, arendamise ja hindamise meetodeid.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Analyzes entrepreneurial processes and entrepreneurship environment.
learning_outcomes.et: 3. Analüüsib ettevõtlusprotsesse ning ettevõtluskeskkonda (konteksti) ning selle mõju ettevõttele.

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Conducts potential customer research to validate the product/service market potential
learning_outcomes.et: 4. Teeb kliendiuuringu ja turuanalüüsi, et kavandada turundustegevusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Designs business model for the ideas.
learning_outcomes.et: 5. Koostab ärimudeli, lähtudes ettevõtluskeskkonna teguritest ja eetika põhimõtetest.
